derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek kokkux 'cuckoo' (because the shape of the human bone resembles the cuckoo's bill)

entry.def: The coccyx is the small triangular bone at the lower end of the spine in human beings and some apes.

means.word_mean: 1. the end of the vertebral column in humans and tailless apes
